meanings.definition: To come or be added as a new or further element or factor
meanings.sent1: New decorations will advene to the room for the party.
meanings.sent2: Extra toppings advene to the pizza for more flavor.
meanings.sent3: The colorful balloons advene to the ceiling, making it a festive sight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter advenes to the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The fresh paint advenes to the walls, brightening up the whole house.

meanings.definition: To become attached or united; adhere
meanings.sent1: The sticker will advene to the paper once you press it down.
meanings.sent2: The magnet advenes to the metal surface and stays in place.
meanings.sent3: The glue advenes to the fabric, making it stick together securely.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty advenes to his friends, always standing by them.
meanings.sent5: The vines advene to the trellis, climbing upwards towards the sun.
